message.body: Liz I was just maybe offered an awesome opportunity and I want to include you somehow /I'll email you details /how much did your call for submissions net you at Liz Afif gallery? ~600 a month right?
In a bad month- in my old gallery space(Afif gallery) it was as much as 3000 after a year of good reviews in art blog and a honed promotion system.
What's the opportunity?
You know Rebekah templeton Contemp gallery?
(Sp)
Space next to them is super pretty only 700 month NO LEASE
Month to month
Wow!
Guy says I can do whatever in space as long as I give him 700 I think I'm going to do it no promises let me keep you in loop bc I'd like to have you act as consultant in some way I'd pay you
That would be awesome!
There's be no responsibility or anything you'd lose I promise
No signed anything
I just chatted w him and now I'm brainstorming
Very exciting
But id def be doing open calls for part of it
And renting space etc for day events
Similar to what you were doing but without lease
And you know how to do that
So I want you involved
K let me get back to you ASAP if this pans out
Also no promises but would you show at Vetri if mark Vetri liked your paintings
Yes!
The restaurant?
Congrats!
Thank you!
Sounds very good
I'm showing there this first Friday and I'm meeting him and I'll show him your stuff
Yes but second floor!
Private space just drinks and first Friday reception
K do you have new stuff or is it all on your website??
My website expired and I have to rebuild and renew it
I'll email them - also there is an album of paintings on my Facebook page
Where can I access your images? Email them to me?
So glad your enthusiastic as ever haha a true entrepreneur
Ok perfect miss you see you soon /thinking of you
(How are you?)
Good- Lillian is awesome
Thank you for thinking of me!
Of course- can't believe I haven't met her yet but I've seen all the adorable fb pics that strategically hide her haha
You don't owe me anything! Very happy to help- you helped me so much!!
I will always think of you btw bc I owe you my first jump start out of grad school! If I build a decent career it'll always be bc of you and I'll owe you 4ever
Also you have wisdom to be miiiined
So it's in my best interest to keep you close lol even if I didn't think you were awesome anyway ( which I do lol)
Feeling very excited about painting/gallery future for both of us. See you and Lillian soon xoxo
I sent you a photo stream- I have to add more
Thanks- a lot of those paintings are sold- but it will give them an idea
Saw it! It's perfect
I'll get back to you ASAP
